lines.name: Emma
lines.text: Alright then, one final test, to make sure you're ready for the real thing.

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: And two final tools to help you accomplish your mission.

lines.name: Frankie
lines.text: I do like playing with new toys.

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: First, I created these noisemakers to distract guards that are in your way.

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: Face where you want to set one down and [color=#44ddff]use an item[/color] (the T key) and select noisemaker to place it on the ground.

lines.name: Terry
lines.text: The best part is, it completely disentigrates.  Not a trace left behind for guards to find!

lines.name: Benji
lines.text: Well, the [b]best[/b] part is the explosion, but whatever.

lines.name: Emma
lines.text: [b]Anyway[/b], the other thing is a wardrobe.  Nothing special, except you can [color=#44ddff]hide inside them[/color] (the F key).

lines.name: Benji
lines.text: Now hurry up and get to the door so we can go eat lunch, alright?
